casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Seid Michael MOSTAFAVI 199A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 5, 2017 Joseph P. Lattimore, Attorney at Law, for Mostafavi, Seid Michael. Brent Kiziah, Assistant Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 1st of September 2017 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of September 2017."
